exercises.name: Plank with Rotation
exercises.description: Hold a plank position on your elbows, rotate your upper body towards one hand while maintaining balance.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Start in a high plank position and lower your body to the ground, then push back up.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees, and lower your body as if sitting in a chair, then rise back up.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Start standing, drop into a squat, jump your feet back to plank position, perform a push-up, then jump back to squat and jump up.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend at the hips and knees to grab a barbell, and lift it by straightening your hips and knees.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Hang from a bar with your palms facing away and pull your chin above the bar.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in a plank position, then alternate bringing each knee towards your chest as fast as you can.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lower your hips to drop your back knee towards the floor, then return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with knees bent and lean back slightly. Rotate your torso from side to side, tapping the floor next to you.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and press a barbell upward, then lower it back to chest level.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on your back, raise your legs towards the ceiling while keeping them straight, and slowly lower them back down.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Stand tall, hold dumbbells in each hand with palms facing forward, and curl the weights towards your shoulders.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Sit on a bench, place your hands behind you, and lower your body by bending your elbows. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips to create a straight line from knees to shoulders, then lower back down.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart, swing a kettlebell between your legs, then drive your hips forward to swing it up.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Stand in front of a box, squat down, and jump onto the box with both feet, then step back down.
